meaningMnemonic: The <radical>sick</radical> <radical>Death Star</radical> needs its <radical>heart</radical> <kanji>cure</kanji>d. If it doesn't get <kanji>healing</kanji> soon, it will die.
readingMnemonic: You realized that the only way to <kanji>cure</kanji> the Death Star is to turn it back into a <reading>yu</reading>rt (ゆ). Then it won't be able to do any more harm, and its outside will reflect its pleasant self on the inside!
